cell.name: control_782
cell.content: <control type="GRID" height="450"> <set name="TableName" value="CIMS_Applicant" /> <set name="ViewName" value="candidates" /> <set name="OpenForm" value="PROFILE:CIMS_Applicant.Admission" /> <set name="CreateForm" value="FORM:default" /> <set name="AllowCreate" value="false" /> <set name="AllowDelete" value="false" /> <set name="HandlerParameters" value="800,500" /> <set name="ShowGridFilterPanel" value="false" /> <set name="ShowActionsMenu" value="true" /> <set name="InputFilterField" value="Admission=[AdmissionActive],Specialty=[SpecialtyByAdmission]" /> </control>
